_metadata.title: Communication Compliance - Financial Regulatory Violations
_metadata.description: Configures Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance to monitor for financial regulatory violations including insider trading signals, conflict-of-interest discussions, unauthorised disclosures of material non-public information (MNPI), and general financial regulatory compliance breaches. Targets Exchange, Teams, and Viva Engage with financial services-specific ML classifiers.

prerequisites: Connect to Security & Compliance PowerShell: Connect-IPPSSession
Microsoft 365 E5 Compliance or Communication Compliance add-on licence required
Communication Compliance role group assigned to financial compliance reviewers
Conduct Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA) for employee monitoring under GDPR
Document lawful basis for communications monitoring under applicable financial regulations
Coordinate with legal, compliance, and risk management teams
Configure dedicated reviewer mailbox for financial compliance team

classifierDetails.financialRegulatoryCompliance: Detects discussions of potential financial regulatory violations, market manipulation, and non-compliant trading practices
classifierDetails.insiderTrading: Identifies communications that may indicate insider trading, tipping, or sharing of material non-public information (MNPI)
classifierDetails.conflictOfInterest: Detects potential conflict-of-interest discussions including personal trading in restricted securities
classifierDetails.unauthorizedDisclosure: Identifies potential unauthorised disclosure of confidential financial data, client information, or proprietary trading strategies

deploymentSteps: 2. Complete regulatory review with financial compliance team
3. Create the Communication Compliance policy with financial classifiers
4. Create the supervisory review rule with 100% sampling rate
5. Assign financial compliance reviewers to the policy
6. Monitor flagged communications in compliance.microsoft.com > Communication compliance
7. Investigate and escalate confirmed violations to legal/compliance
8. Generate regulatory reports for SEC/FINRA examinations
_notes.rollbackProcedure: Remove-SupervisoryReviewPolicyV2 -Identity 'PV28-CommCompliance-RegulatoryViolations'. Note: Previously captured communications remain in the review queue until resolved. Regulatory records may need to be preserved.
